1.title: Set up
1.descr: We painstakingly plan for guaranteed success. Anyone who promises to have your ads up and running in a matter of days is going to lose you a ton of money, guaranteed.
1.quote: An idea can turn into dust or magic, depending on the talent that rubs against it.

cards.title: Research
cards.descr: In-depth understanding of your ideal customer

cards.title: Competitor analysis
cards.descr: We find businesses in your industry that are killing it with paid ads

cards.title: AI Research
cards.descr: We leverage AI to rapidly gain insights into your competitors winning ads, giving us an unfair advantage from the start

cards.title: Lead Magnets
cards.descr: We build our offer & positioning to drive customers

cards.title: Landing Pages
cards.descr: We design World-class landing pages that convert everyone who sees them

cards.title: Platform Selection
cards.descr: We determine the best platforms to advertise on e.g.  Google, X, Instagram, TikTok etc

2.title: Building the profit machine
2.descr: There’s a huge amount of work that goes into doing this right. Most agencies are happy to watch you bleed money inefficiently to the ad platforms. Not us.
2.quote: “Most agencies don’t care about turning your business into a profit-generating machine. We do.”

cards.title: Targeting
cards.descr: We target your ideal customer to perfection depending on interest, search intent, location and lookalike audiences

cards.title: Ad Creation
cards.descr: We build ads and copy that people cannot scroll past without clicking

cards.title: Establish Budget
cards.descr: We determine how many new customers you can handle and establish budget accordingly

cards.title: AI Bid Optimization
cards.descr: We leverage AI tools to reliably optimize our bidding strategy based on 100s of factors, giving us the highest return on PPC spend

cards.title: Tracking
cards.descr: NASA Science-level tracking - We need to track everything perfectly so that we know exactly what impact ads are having

cards.title: Structure
cards.descr: We’ll group all the ad campaigns based on goals, keywords, target audience and more

cards.title: Matching
cards.descr: We’ll then match all of the ads to the right landing page that meets the intent of that advert, to make sure our profit machine converts to perfection

cards.title: Launch
cards.descr: We launch our initial ad campaigns

3.title: Test, grow, scale
3.descr: This isn’t just about running advertising, it’s about growing your business long-term in a highly profitable way.
3.quote: “The top 0.1% of advertisers test 10X more than anyone else.”

cards.title: Learning
cards.descr: The Ad platform needs to learn to optimize

cards.title: Testing
cards.descr: We rapidly test to evaluate performance

cards.title: Lose Money
cards.descr: It may sound counterintuitive, but we need to be conscious that we’re losers at the start, and rapidly become winners

cards.title: Find Winners
cards.descr: It’s our job to find what the winning ads are and then massively scale those up

cards.title: Build the Profit Machine
cards.descr: We’re now starting to fully develop the lead generation machine

cards.title: Optimize & scale
cards.descr: We head back to the lab to run experiments and optimize for maximum profitability

cards.title: Ambitious Growth
cards.descr: We want your business to become the dominant force in your industry

cards.title: Long-Term Vision
cards.descr: Just how big can we grow this thing? We map out how to continue growth for months and years to come, in line with your business resources
